Connect Four

Click the screenshot to play the game and check out the source code on Github

Mastermind

Mastermind is a game I really liked as a child so I thought it would be fun to implement using react. Click the screenshot to play the game and check out the source code on Github

Trivia

I always enjoyed trivia games - trivial pursuit when I was younger and pub trivia now that I'm older :). This app uses the @@@ API to pull in some questions and answers. Click the screenshot to play the game and check out the source code on Github. Good luck, some of these questions are hard!

Minesweeper

Everyone has passed some time on a pc playing minesweeper. Click the screenshot to play the game and check out the source code on Github
